item.title: Candidate for New Orleans Mayor using Disneyland picture?
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: On the left, the header image of Butler’s campaign website. On the right, a picture of New Orleans Square in Disneyland. And, uh, we’re not sayin’, we’re just sayin’… frankly, we don’t remember what the trash cans looked like in the French Quarter, but the cleanliness of the street and the presence of fannypackin’ middle-Americans has us a wee bit suspicious. Check out the picture and the whole article. Subscribe to Wonkette's blog via Blog Buzz Machine.
